name: polar-hooks
description: Performs HTTP auth for us using a token scheme
author: burton@getpolarized.io

scripts.dist-release-polar-cors: firebase use polar-cors && npm run-script firebase-deploy-functions
scripts.dist-release-polar-cors-beta: firebase use polar-cors-beta && npm run-script firebase-deploy-functions
scripts.dist-release-main-webapp: echo Pushing to target ${FIREBASE_HOSTING_TARGET} && firebase use polar-32b0f && firebase target:clear hosting app.getpolarized.io && firebase target:apply hosting app.getpolarized.io ${FIREBASE_HOSTING_TARGET} && firebase deploy --only hosting,storage,firestore && npm run-script firebase-deploy-functions
scripts.dist-release: npm run-script dist-release-init && npm run-script dist-release-main-webapp
